'''2.4.69''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on May 16, 2023.

== Changes ==
* Improvements to game installation reliability.
* Added support for native JRE on ARM64 devices on Windows.
* Various usability updates & under-the-hood bug fixes.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-21785}} - On the Java Edition tab, there is a UI that is slightly lower than the others.
* {{bug|MCL-22699}} - Username is not consistently aligned in the launcher.
* {{bug|MCL-23290}} - MCL uses old Minecraft Dungeons logo.
* {{bug|MCL-23363}} - Minecraft Launcher Showing Old Snapshot Icon.</onlyinclude>
